game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact in the lost city of Eldarath.
game.description: Legend has it that the lost city of Eldarath holds an ancient artifact with unimaginable power. Brave adventurers are needed to retrieve this relic and uncover the secrets of the forgotten city.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting +20% intelligence

tasks.objective: Gather information about the lost city's location
tasks.description: Speak to local villagers and gather rumors about the whereabouts of Eldarath.

tasks.objective: Retrieve an ancient map from a long-abandoned mine
tasks.description: Venture into the abandoned mine on the outskirts of Oakwood and retrieve an ancient map that supposedly leads to Eldarath.

tasks.objective: Explore the lost city and find the artifact
tasks.description: Follow the ancient map to the lost city, navigate its treacherous paths, and retrieve the artifact from the heart of Eldarath.
